segments.text: I'm watching the boy on the stool, and my heart is in my mouth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That two-step stool is leaning at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs look splayed out, like it could just collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, reaching for that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s surprising he hasn't lost his balance already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he's going to tumble backward onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is wet from the overflowing sink!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him seems completely unconcerned about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She just wants her cookies, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is oblivious to this danger right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep expecting to hear a crash at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR
